review: I had been there for annual health check-up consultation.Doctor reviewed all the reports thoroughly and examined patiently and also guided me to become healthy and fit.I recommend Dr. Nidhi  for all general consultations.Thank you madam
Very friendly soft spoken and listens patiently. Very good experience . She prescribes only the required dosage of medicine. Very helpful
